document.full_text: honda motor co  and mazda motor corp  on thursday became the latest major automakers to say they would resume some production in japan after halting plant operations following the earthquake and tsunami of march 11.
document.title: honda, mazda to resume some production
lines_and_colors: honda motor co  and mazda motor corp  on thursday became the latest major automakers to say they would resume some production in japan after halting plant operations following the earthquake and tsunami of march 11.
